item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Cole Palmer open to Man United move
item.description: Cole Palmer, who is reportedly homesick in London, is open to a move to Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: First look at Seahawks-Patriots: Early Super Bowl picks, big questions, key matchups

item.title: Source: Commanders to hire Vikes' Jones as DC
item.description: The Commanders are finalizing a deal to hire Vikings pass game coordinator Daronte Jones as their next defensive coordinator, a source said.
